QuestData.Title: Scourged Mass
QuestData.Description: You can't just kill the Scourge. They will come back. You must destroy the vile matter that makes up their being... and even then, they may come back as spectres.$b$bFew undead use up as much mass as the lumbering abominations. Kill them, then burn their bodies. You will find them all over the Plaguewood.$b$bNever let your rage dissipate, $r. Remember: these abominations are sewn together from the bodies of good people. Their crime is that they exist.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 8 Overstuffed Golems, then use the Crusader's Torch on their corpses.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hold tightly onto your rage, $r. Let it guide your strikes against these beasts.
QuestData.RewardText: A blessed fire cleanses even the most corrupt of flesh.$b$bThey stood no chance in the face of the Light.
